ygData.subject: Kelin`s Lucid Lullaby, how ot use?
ygData.msgSnippet: I finaly got KLL to work last night and it is a sweet song in the right situation.  One question. do you sing it once, re-sing it as soon as you see it pulse,
ygData.messageBody:
I finaly got KLL to work last night and it is a sweet song in the
right situation. One question. do you sing it once, re-sing it as
soon as you see it pulse, or can you weave it with 2 other songs? It
seemed to need to be restarted constantly but I would like to weave it
with hym and anthem to help keep me alive.

Bujold
20th in Unrest
Xegony


______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kelin`s Lucid Lullaby
Author: Non-HP-jgs (jgs@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 9/15/99 7:00 AM


From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

Hehe depends!

If you fight where you gonna get mobbed by greens - you prolly want right
away.

If you fight blues - one at a time - it can wait.

Like all of our songs - it matures as you gain experience and gets better as
you level up. So at first, it will not be really powerfull for you. It
should still work and if you have situations where it is gonna be useful
(crowd control of lesser mobs - later you can control higher mobs but at
first it will be kinda limited)- yes go get it!

For me - its been memmed constantly - more or less since I got it - and now
at 25 - Aviak Avocets will nod -and yes still resists but hehe - he's
nodding a bit! - But we kill him first while the rooks and darters nods in
peace.

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 25th song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk
